entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Cape Race
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:40 PM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cape Race 12:30 AM NDT Friday 24 March 2023
Temperature: -5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: -7.9°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6 except minus 11 in low lying inland areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Low minus 6 except minus 11 in low lying inland areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming east 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning then becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 60 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 3.
